sources.name: genericSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> genericSource

sources.name: mappingLookup
sources.script:
source(output(
		oldname as string,
		newname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> mappingLookup

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Lookup1 sink(mapColumn(
		newname,
		Prop_1,
		Prop_2
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
genericSource, mappingLookup lookup(genericSource@Prop_0 == oldname,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
